View Source

chart

  1. - container in module wk.chart

chart is the container directive for all charts.

Directive Info

  • This directive executes at priority level 0.

Usage

  • as element: 
    <chart
  data=""
  [deep-watch=""]
  [filter=""]
  [title=""]
  [subtitle=""]
  [animation-duration=""]>
...
</chart>

Arguments

Param Type Details
data array

Data to be graphed, ...more
deep-watch
(optional)
 boolean

(default: false)
filter
(optional)
 string

filters the data using the angular filter function
title
(optional)
 string

The chart title
subtitle
(optional)
 string

The chart subtitle
animation-duration
(optional)
 number

animation duration in milliseconds

(default: 300)
